availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William B. Galloway (Scott Co, KY, farmer)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Farmer in Scott County in 1850. Owned nine enslaved persons in Scott County in 1850. Farmer in Scott County in 1860. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Scott County in 1860. Farmer in Scott County in 1863. Owned Rial [Unknown] in Scott County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, p. 461A-B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 940.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 223A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Scott County, KY, July 1863, p. 11.
"W.B. Galloway's Death," The Kentucky Leader (Lexington, KY), October 13, 1888, p. 4.
KYR-0001-005-0017.
